name: Randy Terry
text: We were seated and waited for 20 minutes to be waited on.  Finally just got up and left.  I really like other Mellow Mushroom location I have busted but this was not acceptable.  At the least the server could have come by and said he/she would be with us soon.

name: H. Chap
text: Good food and atmosphere. Outdoors on the patio was fun with television in sight.

name: Asheba Sancho
text: The staff was very helpful and they were also actively practicing safe social distancing guidelines.

name: michel gerebtzoff
text: nothing to write home about. Halfway between restaurant and fast food. Crist more salty than crunchy and slight taste of chlorine in the water.  On the better side friendly service and good drink menu. The terrasse is cool too

name: Bryan Durushia
text: Enjoyed an awesome vegan pizza and some kind of bourbon ginger drink that was also made very well. Great service, chill vibe, awesome wall mirals, casual/typical pricing. Highly recommend!

name: Jason Doyon
text: When the staff of Painted Moose Graphics got to their hotel late in the evening on their business trip, they were ravenous. They ordered three calzones from Mellow Mushroom in Atlanta. They were delivered quickly to their hotel and were still hot! Those calzones hit the spot and started their trip off right!

name: Elisa Waldman
text: Though they‚Äôre expensive for some specialty pizzas, their outdoor dining during covid is fantastic. Music is always too loud. Staff is always very friendly and accommodating. Their sandwiches are priced decently, for what they are. And everything is what‚Äôs yummy.

name: Baliyah
text: I love this place! The pizza taste so fresh along with the ingredients and the staff are always so nice and patient.

name: Dena Isbell
text: It smells so good when you go inside and then the food comes omg it does not disappoint. It's a layed back kinda place but the staff takes pizza very seriously. Quality, flavor, service it's a priority. Kudo's to the shrooms team. And the Esperanza dressing is the best thing ever. Yum!!!

name: Brenda Hunter
text: The Mellow Mushroom is a great place to get a vegetarian meal or meals made with meat. They have pizza, calzones, hoagies and salads. The food is fresh and tasty. They have an outdoor seating area also. The server was friendly and fast to give refills on the drinks. I would recommend this Mellow Mushroom and I will go again.

name: Joshua Giles
text: Mellow Mushroom is my favorite spot for take out pizza. They have a great patio and trivia under normal circumstances. For COVID, their takeout business was booming (I would recommend ordering online as the phone can get backed up). As of ‚Ä¶More

name: Ann Culp
text: Whole family loves Mellow Mushroom pizza. Second only to pizza in Italy. Pepperoni a bit too spicy. Prior brand much better.

name: Liv B
text: This restaurant's way of doing curbside is different from other restaurants that I used curbside. At other restaurants, the food is brought to your car. At Mellow Mushroom Atlanta - Vinings I had to go through the patio where I had to walk ‚Ä¶More

name: Leonard Felton
text: Great pizza. Great service. The dining room is set up for social distancing. Staff wore masks.

name: Amy Wells
text: I love to sit at the bar so Daniel can serve me! He makes GREAT drinks, food is always delish, and conversation is just as good!

name: Claire Galloway
text: This has been one of my better curbside pickup attempts in the 2020 quarantine madness. I liked that their set up actually made it easy to stay far away from other customers. The food was ready exactly when promised. The food itself was ‚Ä¶More

name: Jada Ragin
text: WARNING ESTABLISHMENT IS PREJUDICE!! IF YOU ARE A PERSON OF COLOR YOU WILL BE THE ONLY ONES IN THE BULIDING. If I could give 0 stars I would. I went to this restaurant on my lunch and didn‚Äôt even get to eat. They didn‚Äôt have 2 of their ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan McGowan
text: Always a good choice going to Mellow Mushroom. Although server was slow on outlet last visit due to incorrect order. Seems like servers never write things down any more....

name: Mark Penz
text: Love this place, the staff, and the food. But last weekend's visit was frightening - customers without masks and flaunting their lack of distancing. (Not the staff - they were masked and respectful). I get it, it's a bar and fun spot for ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicole Fox
text: Friendly service, AWESOME Manager, quick service and as always, great food and ice cold beers.

name: Jackson Willis
text: Undeniably the best pizza in town. Beats out all take out pizza, but shows it in quality and price. On the more expensive side, but the bomb. Pretzel bites continue to be the best appetizer known to humanity.

name: Bobby Dixon
text: Excellent service all the time food very well prepared

name: Ave
text: Had a HORRIBLE experience at this location. Ordered two medium pizzas, thin crust, and got these? Usually when I get medium pizzas from a different location they are way bigger. The crust is not thin.. they told me that the wait was an hour ‚Ä¶More

name: I. Oc
text: I‚Äôve visited this location many times and have had nothing but a great experience.  I recently visited this location for a pick up order and I will probably not return.  From the skinny loud bartender who was rude and unprofessional to the ‚Ä¶More

name: Deicy Navi
text: Service was great the pizza was amazing üëè and Iove the artwork to...

name: Matthew N Thomas
text: Definitely a great pizza joint! This is my second time coming to this location and they have not disappointed. They have a phenomenal staff who are were ready to take care of you when you walk in the door. The manager, Rory, was friendly ‚Ä¶More

name: Garnet Morris
text: My family loves the spinach dip from Mellow Mushroom more than the pizza!  Personally I think it's pretty good, not as great as Houston's...but it's pretty good.  The pizza is not bad either....not as good as Blue Moon, but not bad.  Great ‚Ä¶More

name: Bimkubwa Askari
text: The pizza was good. The server was nice. And he gave me two free chocolate chip cookies when I told him it was my first time eating at mellow mushroom

name: Adam Alterman
text:
Messed up our order but made it right but the crust was kinda soggy. Coulda been more generous w the toppings. Great pretzel bites.
UPDATE: last night the pizza kinda sucked. Again, wasn't.cooked enough and stingy toppings. Done w this place.

name: Robert McQueen
text: I wasn't especially hungry so I had the meatball trio. That was very tasty. They also had Scofflaw Basement IPA on tap which made me happy. A lot of places either don't have it or run out of it.

name: Jesus-Daniel Gutierrez
text: Well located in the heart of Vinings and locally accesible by walking and driving. After a recent renovation it is now larger, with ample and comfortable seats and a full bar. Their pizzas are awesome but for me the calzones seem bigger and ‚Ä¶More

name: Alberto Aguirre
text: Gluten free pizza is worth the trip.

name: Dorothy Elling
text: Anthony was an awesome waiter and the holy shitake pie was fantadtic!

name: Mark Gladson
text: I always complain that Mellow Mushroom is a bit expensive, but the food really is awesome. I ordered over $100 bucks worth of pies and other goodies for our Wonderful daughters 27th Birthday. She is Vegan, so she made her own vegan pie ‚Ä¶More

name: Christy Muckle
text: Friendly service. Great food üëç

name: Rebecca Woody
text: Ordered pizza online and had to wait another 15 minutes before it was ready when I went to pick it up. And got the wrong order, it appears they were understaffed

name: Toqeer Chouhan
text: Pizza at its finest - Truffle Mushroom is a must-have.

name: La Shanti Pruitt
text: It's okay, but not worth the expensive price tag.

name: Kevin Dressner
text: The confirmation email for my online order said it would be ready at 7:04. I arrived on time and it had not even been put in the oven yet. I received it at 7:25. The staff were not apologetic for the wait at all - no ‚Äúsorry for the wait‚Äù or ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Tidwell
text: We always love coming here. Food and service are awesome. Sometimes they can be a bit slow getting the food out but for the most part they are quick. Great place to relax.

name: Khan Lee
text: Very delicious, even the crust. Ate everything. The house special taste very fresh and mellow.

name: Joshua Jones
text: Fantastic pizza! Wow the bbq chicken or whatever they call it was delicious. The crust is so good as well.

name: Fre
text: Great restaurant! The server recommended pretzel bites, they were great! Wonderful time with family good pizza, great store manager!

name: Christin Walker
text: Soooooooo good!

name: Jackie Hill
text: The food was pretty good I had my usual pizza with avocado on the top atmosphere it's pretty cool nice and laid-back everything was clean

name: Pete Lomont
text: Sat at the bar. Descent selection of drinks. Very easy going hippie type vibe. Never had a bad pizza here. Hardest part is choosing what to get.

name: Mike Maniaci
text: Really good staff, pizza, and calzones

name: Joe Sias
text: Great service, great food, and a nice atmosphere.

name: Gigi Smith
text: Best pizza I've ever tasted in my entire life I don't see piece of getting any better then what you get from this place

name: aimee hartz

text: Jash was the best server !!! The Margs were great .

name: michaelfrantz1
text: Great service and excellent pizza!

name: Ona Strikas
text: This Mellow always has fast service by people who care. And has Mellow's classicly good food. Not really a bad thing on the menu.

name: Tameka Womack-Jean
text: Great, fresh, made to order pizza that you can make your own. You can create your own pie. Fast, sit down service and kind employees. :-)

name: Brandon Pal
text: Awesome food! Came in with a big party. They mixed up our order, but our server was super helpful and more than made up for it. Great place!

name: Dustin Lockhart
text: Great pizza. A great place to come Mellow out after a long day.

text: Food is fantastic, I heavily recommend the Chicken Q pizza. The service was weird though. Multiple waiters asked if we were ok and then when we were leaving they offered us a cup of water to go

name: Adam Fejfar
text: Friendly atmosphere. Great pizza perfect service.

text: The food is great! The waitress was a bit dry with me but once I said something to the manager, she perked right up....

name: ben peace
text: One of the best mellow mushrooms around

name: John Smith
text: Fine service and very good f00d.

name: Luke

name: Mike Brock
text: Great Calzone.   Good service at the bar.

name: art lasanta
text: Great pizza and wings  best waitress ever

name: Kiss
text: Delicious üòã üòã

name: Genesis Rengulbai
text: Great customer service great place

name: Tia Alvarez-Stith
text: Clean, nice staff and very laid back environment.  Kid friendly with healthy options for kids focusing on adding fruits and veggies.  I was also able to make a pretty good gluten free pizza.

name: Ron Frederick
text: Great pizza -- even the gluten free version was awesome

name: Sophie B.
text: Always love the shroom, along with great friends, and a delicious brew

name: Julian Delgado
text: Excellent food, even better service üôè

name: Roselyn Maurice
text: it was okay, friendly yes the food wasn't as good as usual.  little less cheese.

name: William Richards
text: Been going here for years. The took a little pizzeria and changed it into a beautiful modern restaurant. The pizza was spot on like always love the new large flat screens for watching the game. Great job with the remodel guys !!!!

name: Pete Quist
text: Nice family atmosphere.  Very good service and great pizza.  Craft beers are appreciated along with 80 hair metal music.

name: Jenna Glenzer
text: Great service, and I really appreciate that the company looks out for people with allergies. (Gluten) Keep it up!

name: Charles Burke
text: The remodeling is great.  Nice outdoor bar.  Good food.

name: Sarah Brex
text: Great food & gluten free pizza is safe for Celiacs! I'm always grateful when I can eat out without getting sick! Our server Ally & the manager Ryan made our visit very enjoyable. Other staff members also came to deliver food & grab empty plates. Great teamwork!

name: Robbie Wright
text: Excellent atmosphere and food

name: James Tobias
text: We love this mellow mushroom. Good service, good food, good location. It has a nice outside patio and we generally bring our dog along with us. The staff is always friendly and brings out some water and loves the dog. I would recommend the calzones, they are my favorite!

name: Christy McDonald
text: Best gluten free pizza on the face of the planet (at least in my opinion)

name: D'Enda White
text: Great food! Great service!

name: Keith Osburn
text: Great place and we love the outdoor area!  The food was perfect and it was served quickly. But, the best part is bbc the staff.  Warm, friendly and very attentive...5 stars!

name: Jim Terry
text: Food was great but the facility is inaccessible for wheelchair users.  You can get in but don't try to use the restroom. It is big enough but they have ignored just about everything they should have fixed by 1993: grab bars, accessible ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Knight
text: Great pizza, lots of choices. Even for vegans. Good service.

name: creed perry
text: Best pizza in Atlanta for me. The staff is always really nice as well.

name: Polo Jay
text: Service was great! India, our waitress was on point! We didn't have to ask her twice for anything & even though they were VERY busy,  she made sure to get by & check on our needs. The manager did also! The host didn't keep us waiting to sit ‚Ä¶More

name: Tina Mendel
text: The food was okay, it wasn't as great as I remembered but, at least Rory was sexy and friendly

name: Manfred Mann
text: Mellow Mushroom is one of the best of the chain-pizza joints.  I like all of the pizzas on the menu.

name: Chas Crawford
text: Amazing pizza, great service. Only complaint would be the lack of beer selection. Seems like they‚Äôre a bit behind on ordering backup kegs. Allison was a great bartender!

name: Lois
text: Always love "The Mushroom".  Absolute BEST Pizza on earth.  One hundred "YUMS"

name: Michael Savoie
text: Awesome bar staff and the place looks great after the remodel! Plus, you can't beat the pizzas!

name: Ming Wu
text: Great place for party. Staff all very friendly. Variety food you can choose.

name: Wesley Forlines
text:
Service is great and though we don't go often, remembers us.

Food is standard Mellow quality, and as quick as a pizza place can be. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tara Pullen
text: We love Mellow Mushroom, and this one is probably our third favorite one we've been to. Great service, great food, the only drawback is that they have a limited selection of beers on tap. Hopefully when they get their bar remodel there will ‚Ä¶More

name: Taylor Lael
text: I haven't been to this location in a long while and recently returned to discover they've finished a complete remodel! Very nice atmosphere and the food is still amazing as ever!

name: Chariss Newsom
text: Service isn't great here. The servers are all very nice, but everything seems to take a very long time. And the wait for food is often very long. But the food is consistent and good; it's what you expect from a Mellow Mushroom. If you order ‚Ä¶More

name: Sunn Flower
text: Yummy pizza and very large (small size) salads

name: Dominic Baggott
text: Staff are always pleasent and enthusiastic about the food, I'm a vegeterian and the two veg pizza options are really tasty, I especially enjoy the wheat crust pizza base, a bit more chewing required but adds to the flavour

name: Dhvani M. Javia
text: Mellow mushroom is the only pizza I love but this location ruined my experience. I ordered kosmic karma and luckily I checked it in the car just to realize there was no pesto in it!!! I went back in and told them amd they just casually said ‚Ä¶More

text: Food and service was great

name: DAaron Stewart
text: Love the environment, very warm welcoming place. Food is outstanding, no wait time, excellent service

name: Jason Kaine
text: Great service at the bar! Nice people and quick food

name: Rebecca Mckenna
text: The staff was kind and courteous.  So fast. Food delicious as always!

name: Tommy Scaggs
text: Very good food as always. Excellent staff. Allyson was very attentive. Will definitely go back and visit again!

name: Alex Strachan
text: Great place, lovely time

name: Helene Dee Howard-E.
text: Great staff! Good pizza & great sangria!!

name: Rob Fowler
text: Always an excellent time here.  With hot and fresh pizza, cool crisp salads, cold beer, could you ask for anything more?  Enjoy an Enlightened Spinach salad with Esperanza dressing and a Red Skin Potato pie.  You cannot go wrong.

name: Joey Bunnelle
text: Great Mellow Mushroom! Inside is cozy and and a nice patio/porch for outside sitting. Light on the bacon on my pizza compared to other Mellow's I've been to but still great food! Also great to have the owner/manager check in on your experience

name: Ricky Spaulding
text: Great team and management!! Love the new remodel! Pizza was delicious as normal!!

name: Keith Roe
text: Easy work week lunch parking. Good food. Good service. Although I received the "Just one" statement upon arrival. As if one isn't enough.

name: Ryan Schwartz
text:
First timer.

And from a guy who grew up in NJ - this is some pretty darn respectable pizza. ‚Ä¶More

text: Veggie pizzas were good!!

name: Eddie Westerfield
text: Great food and very nicely renovated. Parking can be an issue though.

name: Lauren Lockett
text: Their pizza sauce has a weird aftertaste. It was so bad we didn‚Äôt even finish the box, terrible.  I will not be back here. Oh and the customer service sucked.

name: ritawilson267
text: Omg, my calzone was huge...and good!!!

name: Scott White
text: This location has been closed for renovations but is not marked it as such. Wasted time driving here. Strange that reviews about the food are being posted while it‚Äôs closed, makes you wonder....

name: Bob Cooney
text: Mellow is always fantastic pizza, and this one does everything right.  It is a very busy location though, so sometimes that dings this place.  It more than makes up for it though by always having top customer service and being delicious.  The building it is in is also pretty neat and original, fits Vinings area well.

text: Great for take out. Online ordering was a breeze.

name: Mizz Bradley

text: Great place for tasty GF options. I didn't have high expectations but I left thoroughly satisfied and so far, my tummy agrees! I wish they were in my home town of STL.

name: Shawmeaka Rankin
text: Normally the food is good but this time I pizza was kind of undercooked I like Mellow Mushroom I will continue to go but I will let them know next time to cook my pizza more so it won't be soggy
